data.title: Neighborhood Care
data.meta_description: EmblemHealth Neighborhood Care offers in-person customer service, free health and wellness classes, and resources to manage your health—all right in your neighborhood.
data.text:
Each location offers a unique set of programs tailored to the community, but all locations provide help and guidance navigating insurance and health care. To find classes offered at a specific location, see our calendar.

Here are just a few examples of classes you’ll find:

Fitness: Low-impact Zumba, power of walking, cardio kickboxing, chair yoga.

De-stress: Meditation, stress management, yoga.

Technology: Understanding your cellphone and tablet.

Personal health: Community groups, diabetes self-management, nutritional workshops.

Yes! Non-members are still a part of our community. We’re happy to provide you with health and wellness classes, answer any questions you have about health care or health insurance, and (if you’re interested) connect you with an EmblemHealth sales representative to purchase health insurance.

Neighborhood Care is open to everyone, regardless of whether you live in the neighborhood. If you see an event you’d like to attend at a different location, we encourage you to check it out!

No, but we’re here to help you address the problems that affect your health and walk you through solutions. While Neighborhood Care does not offer medical care, we can help you find the right doctor, manage your prescriptions, and more. Some Neighborhood Care locations share a space with AdvantageCare Physicians, a primary and specialty care practice part of the EmblemHealth family of companies.
